title: Why is Basketball Such a Popular Sport? Basketball IQ, Explained
content:
Basketball is a fun team sport that connects people with similar interests and physical ability. The game’s duration is fairly short, this oftentimes results in  building tremendous anticipation throughout the game. Basketball also encourages teamwork as players have to develop critical social skills to work as a team. The sport encourages players to burn calories, increase coordination and improve concentration. 

![](https://recreation.gmu.edu/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/basketball.jpg)

In order to perform well in basketball, basketball IQ is needed. It is referred to as the ability to instinctively play the game and adapt to any possible situation throughout the game. It requires a blend of technical skill, game awareness and understanding, and experience. Basketball IQ is heavily involved in how the game turns out and can help your team to win.

![](https://static.ffx.io/images/%24zoom_0.3362%2C%24multiply_0.3909%2C%24ratio_1.776846%2C%24width_1059%2C%24x_67%2C%24y_88/t_crop_custom/q_86%2Cf_auto/d52dd4f0316d351fbf420b412e41b7b2b8904be9)

To gain perspective in basketball IQ, players must first watch games to learn. This gives them a different focus on the various plays being used and can introduce new moves and new strategies that makes the teams more successful and competitive. Bill Walton, American television sportscaster and former professional basketball player, used this technique of rewatching games which made him transcend to a whole new level. This habit of analysing games earned him the spot of Most Valuable Player in the 1977 NBA Finals.

![](https://www.mywabashvalley.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/62/2022/07/b4de2a3b2e55472d85fca99a2cdf2127.jpg?w=2560&h=1440&crop=1)

Next, players must connect with the local basketball community. Find players, coaches, trainers on social media or apps such as Playard, you can expand your basketball knowledge and gain new technical skills as well. Community Basketball League Singapore is a community that connects basketball enthusiasts in clubs for league games!

![](https://i.eurosport.com/2021/04/24/3120513-63965988-2560-1440.jpg)

In conclusion, by following these tips and tricks, you can put your basketball iq into action and bring victory to your team!
